amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the EPA to provide notice to communities about the anticipated effects of this Act on air quality not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 114-453 to require the EPA to provide notice to communities about the anticipated effects of this Act on air quality not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Peters.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
